title: Merchandise trade (% of GDP)
name: tg.val.totl.gd.zs
readme: Merchandise trade as a share of GDP is the sum of merchandise exports and imports divided by the value of GDP, all in current U.S. dollars.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Merchandise trade as a share of GDP is the sum of merchandise exports and imports divided by the value of GDP, all in current U.S. dollars.
